helpText.gwpActive: Set to true to enable to GWP. False to disable.

helpText.productHandle: Enter the nacelle handle of the product. Always kebab case i.e some-product-handle (never include /)
helpText.productVariantId: The shopify variant id to be set as the GWP item. (Required)
helpText.purchaseThreshold: Amount needed for the GWP to be unlocked. (Required)
helpText.collectionHandle: Set to false if GWP threshold amount is not tied to any collection (collection-handle as fail safe for 'Key') Set to a valid collection handle to tie the GWP threshold amount to a specific collection (Required)
helpText.lockedHeader: Copy text shown when GWP is locked. [product] is a tag that will be replaced with the product name.
helpText.lockedSubheader: Copy text shown when cart subtotal amount is 0. Use [threshold] to dynamically pull in minimum.
helpText.lockedCopy: Copy text shown when customer is below the threshold.
helpText.unlockedHeaderCopy: Copy text shown when customer has met the threshold.
helpText.unlockedCopy: Helper copy text for unlocked gwp.
helpText.unlockedAddCopy: Copy text shown when product is unlocked but it has not be added to cart
helpText.unlockedAddedCopy: Copy text shown when the GWP item is added to cart
helpText.footerMessage: Copy text shown at the bottom of GWP Unlocked
